wordGroup: diagonally dominant 对角占优；对角优势的
diagonally dominant matrix 对角主导矩阵

sentences.en: Vaulting the stile, he headed diagonally across the paddock.
sentences.cn: 他跃过梯台，从围场里斜穿过去。

sentences.en: That means I'm going to go diagonally like this.
Lighted up, the diagonally positioned outer wall seems emphasized.
sentences.cn: 亮点，斜置的外墙似乎被强调了。
